MODAL_ADD_AUTHENTICATOR_HINT: Give it a name you'll recognize, like the device or app you're using.
MODAL_SETUP_STEP1_DESC: Open your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.) and scan this QR code:
MODAL_SETUP_MANUAL_ENTRY_DESC: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this key manually:
MODAL_SETUP_STEP2_DESC: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app:
MODAL_ADD_PHONE_HINT: Give it a name you'll recognize.
MODAL_VERIFY_PHONE_DESC: We've sent a verification code to your phone number. Enter it below to complete setup:
MODAL_VERIFY_PHONE_CODE_LABEL: Enter the 6-digit code from your text message:
MODAL_BACKUP_CODES_DESC: Backup codes let you access your account if you lose your 2FA device.
MODAL_BACKUP_CODES_WARNING: You cannot view existing codes (they are securely hashed). You can only view new codes when regenerating.
MODAL_VERIFY_IDENTITY_DESC: Enter your current 2FA code to regenerate backup codes:
MODAL_VERIFY_IDENTITY_WARNING: Regenerating will invalidate ALL existing backup codes
MODAL_NEW_BACKUP_CODES_WARNING_DESC: You won't be able to see them again.
CONFIRM_REMOVE: Are you sure you want to remove "[label]" from your account?
